text:
A #COVID19 #vaccine Town Hall, Monday, Feb. 22, 2021 at (9:45 - 11 a.m.) EDT @USArmy FB so Soldiers, Army Civilians, Family members & contractors can hear directly from Army leaders on the COVID-19 #vaccine. Engage Army experts in the comment thread. 
#COVID19Vaccine #coronavirus https://t.co/peSBm2NAzo
